__e: Listen, uh, I know it's wrong to bother you at work, but I saw these flowers, thought of today, and you.
I mean, I guess why bother having a list if you're not gonna do it?
I know I'm not supposed to bother you at work, but you're not gonna believe what I found.
Sorry to wake you so early, but I think we need your help.
Sorry to bother you so late, but your sister's on the phone.
I'm sorry to bother you so late, but I think you know why I've come.
Karen, I'm not saying this to upset you... but you ought to know they're saying that you did it.
Look, I don't want to bother you, but I'm doing a film about life in the tunnels... and I hear you're a cop, so...
Hey, I-- I'm really sorry to bother you, but you're the only person I know in this entire town, so do you think you could come and get me?
So, dad... turns out, I did have a bunch of questions for you last week, but I didn't want to bother you with them.
Like, why bother with something not good just because it's something?
I don't want to disturb you, but I really need them. I mean, if you give them to me... And if you don't...
"Hey, I know stuff's been weird with us," "but Charlie introduced me to someone" "and it's serious, so I won't be bothering you anymore."
I think I'll take the camera away from you so it can't bother you any more,
- I wanted to tell you that I think that you're right, and that I don't deserve you in my life.
Well, there ain't nobody gonna be, uh, bothering' you or any of yours again.
I didn't know which was which, so I didn't want to call my friend and then bother you.
He's not gonna be bothering you or anyone for a long time.
